Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அறன்ஈனும் இன்பமும் ஈனும் திறனறிந்து தீதின்றி வந்த பொருள்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The wealth acquired with a knowledge of the proper means and without foul practices will yield virtue and happiness.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A clear, pure stream of golden coins, representing wealth acquired by fair and skillful means ('திறனறிந்து தீதின்றி வந்த பொருள்'), flows through a landscape.
Layered_Composition.Midground: As the stream flows, it nurtures the land. On one bank, it causes a magnificent temple of Virtue ('அறன்') to grow. On the other bank, it nourishes a beautiful garden of Happiness ('இன்பம்').
Layered_Composition.Background: The source of the stream is a wise and skillful person, and the entire landscape is one of balance and harmony, showing that this type of wealth creates both virtue and joy.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Wealth that is acquired skillfully and without evil will itself give birth to both Virtue and Happiness.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The pure stream of gold is the fairly-earned wealth. The temple of Virtue and the garden of Happiness are the two fruits that grow from it.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A bright, clean, golden light emanates from the stream. The colors are pure, vibrant, and positive.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide, flowing landscape shot that follows the stream and shows the two magnificent things it creates.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a beautiful, idealized, and painterly quality.

Cultural_Anchors: Wealth acquired without evil ('தீதின்றி வந்த பொருள்')

Negative_Prompt: a muddy stream, a ruined temple, a dead garden, text artifacts.
